Messages.userCreated: User was successfully created. Try to sign in website.
Messages.eventSubscribe: You successfully subscribed to the event.
Messages.eventUnsubscribe: You successfully unsubscribed from the event.
Messages.loginFail: Email or Password is incorrect. Check it once more.
Messages.userInfoAccess: User data can be retrieved only in logged in state!
Messages.sameEmail: User with the same email was created. Try to change email or sign in the website.
Messages.userNotFound: User was not found. Please check data.
Messages.uploadFailed: Error was occured. Comment was not published. Try again later.
Messages.notEnoughAccess: You account type has not this permission.
